short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clip web pages and save them to your Kuloo channel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the Kuloo extension to save things you see on the web into your Kuloo channel.
Kuloo Web Clipper helps you save interesting things you find on the Web into your Kuloo channel. With Kuloo Web Clipper, CLIP any webpage and have access to that information whenever and wherever you need it.

Goodbye, bookmarks. Hello, Web Clipper!
Clip the web pages you want to keep. Save them in Kuloo. Easily access them on any device.

"Use Kuloo as the place you share everything â€¦ show interesting web content to your friends and followers"
